name: DiceVille
description:
Description:

A Procedural 2.5D Action Platformer, Where Each Attack Is Random.

Lord DiceBob and his army are trying to take over DiceVille. It's your job to protect it.

Explore a unique and randomly generated world, while fighting different types of enemies. In this world, all your attacks are random, so don't plan too far ahead.

Controls:

Start: Y

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Attack: Left Click
